an5.127:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
an5.127:1.3: It’s when a mendicant is not content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they have a lot of sensual thoughts.
an5.127:1.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
an5.127:2.1: A mendicant with five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
an5.127:2.3: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they think a lot about renunciation.
an5.127:2.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.”
